name: Boomball
description:
Boomball - a 2-player soccer inspired game where taking a shot destroys the robot that took it! My first game jam game! Constructive criticism welcome.

Music made by my brother.

Controls:

Left Player:

Movement - WASD

Shoot - F (hold to charge up, release to shoot)

Pass - G

Right Player:

Movement - Arrow Keys

Shoot - Return (hold to charge up, release to shoot)

Pass - Right Shift
